examples: the emerging buds were a sure sign of spring
he will hold office until the spring of next year

definitions.text: a metal elastic device that returns to its shape or position when pushed or pulled or pressed
a natural flow of ground water
a point at which water issues forth
the elasticity of something that can be stretched and returns to its original length
a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards
move forward by leaps and bounds
examples: The horse bounded across the meadow
The child leapt across the puddle
Can you jump over the fence?
our plans began to take shape

definitions.text: spring back; spring away from an impact
examples: These particles do not resile but they unite after they collide

definitions.text: produce or disclose suddenly or unexpectedly
examples: He sprang these news on me just as I was leaving
